thumb.title: Black and Blue (original song, Vocaloid, Asahi/Sandra/Allen)
thumb.description: In a similar vein to 10cc's song, penned some time back, this track is also about "the things we do for love". Unlike that 70s number, this song's a bit wonky in terms of structure, which fits the track's intent too. I wasn't sure about the piano coda but it cross-faded nicely into the next track so I kept it! Tech NotesDrums are from Groove Agent with Halion clangs. Bass sounds from Tricent (full bucket.de ðŸ’ª) and Halion. Synths and beeps from CS-80, Halion, Padshop, UAD PolyMAX, more Tricent, Retrologue; 'The Grand' piano. Vocal synths are courtesy of Vocaloid 6's Asahi, Sandra & Allen.
